title: There's A Little Kanye in All of Us
description: On a passion-filled journey infused with humor, horror and truth, Kanye West and his inner child navigate their way around Los Angeles in search of his ill daughter North. The piss-poor feelings, emotions and moods we all have a tendency to experience are highlighted through Kanyeâ€™s behavior and rectified by his annoying, yet well-intentioned, younger self as they dash across the city in pursuit of her.
author: Donald R.   Brown
